Sentencas: Oxygen storage materials (OSMs) have potential as catalysts to purify automobile exhaust, electrode materials in solid oxide fuel cells and metal-air batteries, and electrolytes in solid oxide electrolysis cells.
Titulo: In situ evaluation of the electronic/local structure in B-site mixed perovskite-type oxide SrFe0.6Mn0.4O3-δ

Sentencas: Perovskite-type oxides, ABO(3), may enhance the OSM properties.
Titulo: In situ evaluation of the electronic/local structure in B-site mixed perovskite-type oxide SrFe0.6Mn0.4O3-δ

Sentencas: Herein, the correlations between the oxygen desorption/absorption and the electronic and local structure in SrFe0.6Mn0.4O3-delta are evaluated by in situ X-ray absorption spectroscopy.
Titulo: In situ evaluation of the electronic/local structure in B-site mixed perovskite-type oxide SrFe0.6Mn0.4O3-δ

Sentencas: Additionally, SrFeO3-delta and SrMnO3-delta are assessed to determine the difference in B-site mixed perovskite-type oxides.
Titulo: In situ evaluation of the electronic/local structure in B-site mixed perovskite-type oxide SrFe0.6Mn0.4O3-δ

Sentencas: X-ray absorption near edge structure spectra showed the valence state of Fe ions in SrFe0.6Mn0.4O3-delta solely changes but the coordination symmetry of both Mn and Fe changes as the temperature rises.
Titulo: In situ evaluation of the electronic/local structure in B-site mixed perovskite-type oxide SrFe0.6Mn0.4O3-δ

Sentencas: Hence, the oxygen release from the FeO6 octahedron accompanied variations of neighboring Mn-O polyhedrons.
Titulo: In situ evaluation of the electronic/local structure in B-site mixed perovskite-type oxide SrFe0.6Mn0.4O3-δ

Sentencas: The oxygen desorption/absorption reaction depends on the interlocking changes in the local structure of the mixed B-site elements in the perovskite-type materials, suggesting that the B-site elements can be optimized for use as OSMs.
Titulo: In situ evaluation of the electronic/local structure in B-site mixed perovskite-type oxide SrFe0.6Mn0.4O3-δ
